class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        
        n = len(nums)
        ptr = n - 1
        c = Counter()
        
        for i in range(n // 2):
            c[abs(nums[i] - nums[ptr])] += 1
            ptr -= 1
    
        # print(n, c)
        res = math.inf
        
        
        def check(x):
            ptr = n - 1
            res = 0
            
            for i in range(n // 2):
                diff = abs(nums[i] - nums[ptr])
                # print(nums[i], nums[ptr], res, diff)
                
                mi = min(nums[i], nums[ptr])
                ma = max(nums[i], nums[ptr])
                
                if diff > x:
                    d2 = diff - x
                    
                    if mi + d2 <= k:
                        res += 1
                        ptr -= 1
                        continue
                    
                    if ma - d2 >= 0:
                        res += 1
                        ptr -= 1
                        continue
                elif diff < x:
                    d2 = x - diff
                    # print(d2)
                    if ma + d2 <= k:
                        # print('c1', ma, d2, k)
                        res += 1
                        ptr -= 1
                        continue
                    elif mi - d2 >= 0:
                        # print(c2)
                        res += 1
                        ptr -= 1
                        continue
                    
                    
                    
                else:
                    ptr -= 1
                    continue
                    
                        
                        
                # print(i, ptr)
              
                res += 2
                ptr -= 1
            
            return res
 
        
        
        
        for ke, v in c.items():
            # print(ke, v, res)
            if ke > k or (n // 2) - v >= res:
                continue
                
            x = check(ke)
            # print(ke, x)
            res = min(res, x)
        
        return res
